mapper.select: select u.*,us.userId as userId, us.userName as userName, o.operState as operState from (select * from (select @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM, A.* from (select * from BOARD order by brdNo DESC LIMIT 18446744073709551615 ) A, ( SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) R) RN where RN.ROWNUM >= #{start} and RN.ROWNUM <= #{end}) u join USERS us on u.userNo=us.userNo join OPERATIONSTATE o on u.operStateNo=o.operStateNo order by ROWNUM
mapper.update: update BOARD set brdExpectPrice=#{brdExpectPrice}, brdExpectEndDate=#{brdExpectEndDate}, operStateNo=#{operStateNo} where brdNo=#{brdNo}
